/usr/local/cuda-12.6/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  --generate-code=arch=compute_72,code=[compute_72,sm_72] --generate-code=arch=compute_87,code=[compute_87,sm_87] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/video-stab.dir/src/Stabilizer.cpp.o CMakeFiles/video-stab.dir/src/CamCap.cpp.o CMakeFiles/video-stab.dir/src/RollCorrection.cpp.o CMakeFiles/video-stab.dir/src/AutoZoomCrop.cpp.o -o CMakeFiles/video-stab.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda-12.6/lib64  -L/usr/local/cuda-12.6/targets/aarch64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-12.6/targets/aarch64-linux/lib  libstabilizer_cuda.a -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
